location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Donald Robertson, Horringer Rectory, nr Bury St Edmunds to Sir Lewis Pelly, KCSI, Agent for Governor General Rajpootana [Rﾄ）asthﾄ］]

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Donaldson's hopes of obtaining an appointment in Rajpootana [Rﾄ）asthﾄ］] on his return to India and asking if Pelly would be willing to write a few lines in support of his application.
